sendBridge(address,address,address,addre.details: Combines OFT send and OApp message in a single atomic operation

params._oapp: Address of the OApp contract for messaging
params._oft: Address of the OFT adapter for token transfer

sendBridge(address,address,address,addre.notice: Initiates a cross-chain bridge operation combining token transfer and messaging
